my new repository:

- [ ] is added to the bottom *or* with existing repos from the same account
- [ ] contains a license
- [ ] `language` is not any of:
  * `system`
  * `script`
  * `docker`
  * `docker_image`
- [ ] does not contain "pre-commit" in the name
